title: Getting Started Guide
content:
# Getting Started Guide

A quick-start guide for digital wallets and their merchants to learn the basic steps to get onboarded to the Mini Program Platform.

## Get to know Mini Program

[Learn the basics about the latest technology and services of Mini Programs.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/about/)

[Watch this video to quickly learn how to manage Mini Programs on the platform.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/getting-started/videos?pageVersion=2)

## Onboarding to the Platform

[Apply an account and KYB for merchants or acquirers.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/getting-started/merchant-on-boarding)

[Quickstart creating a mini program after onboarding on the Mini Program Platform for the first time.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/create)

## Build your first Mini Program

[Download Mini Program Studio and install the IDE.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/mini-program-studio_overview)

[Create a project and debug your demo Mini Program in the IDE.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/quick-start_try-mini-program-demo)

[Understand the file structure, global variables and page directory.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/quick-start_understand-the-mini-program-file-structure)

[Preview the Mini Program on a device and upload the ready-to-go Mini Program to the Platform.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/quick-start_release-mini-program#Upload)

## Release Mini Programs

[Customize your Mini Programs according to cross-border or local businesses.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/configure)

[Start compatibility testing and go through an approval process to release the Mini Program.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/release)

## Dive Deeper

[Get the development resources and references such as components, framework, JSAPIs and Open APIs.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/developer-guide)

[Learn product features to use the Mini Program Console.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/overview)

[Dip into the rich UI guidelines to design a Mini Program.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/design/guideline)
